title: Playoffs in Austin
snippet: After three Stages of the BLAST.tv Austin Major, eight teams have survived and advanced to the Playoffs.

title: Capture the Moment
snippet: Activate your Austin 2025 Viewer Pass and set your Pick'Ems before the first matches start.

title: BLAST.TV Austin Major 2025
snippet: Join June 3rd as the first stage of the major gets underway!

title: Counter-Strike 2 Update - May 22, 2025
snippet: Rendered viewangle adjustments due to recoil are now calculated per frame.

title: Counter-Strike 2 Update - May 20, 2025
snippet: Jura: Updated to the latest version from the Community Workshop.

title: Counter-Strike 2 Update - May 16, 2025
snippet: Deathmatch mode now allows unbalanced teams.

title: Counter-Strike 2 Update - May 14, 2025
snippet: Fixed a bug where weapons purchased with "Buy & Throw" could be refunded after firing.

title: Counter-Strike 2 Update - May 13, 2025
snippet: Fixed a bug where searching for Defusal Group Alpha would lead to Anubis and Defusal Group Delta would lead to Vertigo.

title: Counter-Strike 2 Update - May 9, 2025
snippet: Fixed a case where mission progress appeared to be reset when reconnecting to a match in-progress.

title: Mission Possible
snippet: Today's update includes several community maps, a rearranging of casual and deathmatch map groups, and the introduction of weekly missions!

title: Counter-Strike 2 Update - May 8, 2025
snippet: Fixed a case where mission progress appeared to be reset when reconnecting to a match in-progress.

title: Counter-Strike 2 Update - April 1, 2025
snippet: Added three all-new weapon collections to the Weekly Care Package drop list: Ascent, Boreal, and Radiant.
